sentences.en: a reasonably priced apartment
sentences.cn: 定价合理的公寓

sentences.en: A vicious price war between manufacturers has cut margins to the bone.
sentences.cn: 制造商之间的恶性价格战已将利润削减到了最低。

sentences.en: Ballpark estimates indicate a price tag of $90 million a month.
sentences.cn: 大致的估计费用为每月9,000万美元。

sentences.en: Clarke kept talking the price up, while Wilkinson kept knocking it down.
sentences.cn: 克拉克不断把价格向上抬，而威尔金森则不断往下压。

sentences.en: Competition should beat the price down.
sentences.cn: 竞争一定会使价格下跌。

sentences.en: his generosity comes at a price.
sentences.cn: 他为慷慨付出很高代价。

sentences.en: Investors can apply for a package of shares at a set price.
sentences.cn: 投资者可以申购固定价格的股票组合。

sentences.en: She balked at the price.
sentences.cn: 她对这价格犹豫不决。

sentences.en: Slovenia will have to pay a high price for independence.
sentences.cn: 斯洛文尼亚将为独立付出巨大的代价。

sentences.en: Splitting the price six ways had still cost them each a bundle.
sentences.cn: 即使把价钱平摊成6份，每人也还是要花一大笔钱。

sentences.en: The basic price for a 10-minute call is only £2.49.
sentences.cn: 10分钟的基本通话费只有2.49英镑。

sentences.en: The price depends on the intricacy of the work.
sentences.cn: 价格取决于做工的复杂精细度。

sentences.en: The price includes two economy class airfares from Brisbane to Los Angeles.
sentences.cn: 这一价格包括两张从布里斯班到洛杉矶的经济舱机票。

sentences.en: The price of a single ticket is thirty-nine pounds.
sentences.cn: 单程票的价格是39英镑。

sentences.en: The price of fuel keeps going up.
sentences.cn: 燃料价格持续上涨。

sentences.en: The price of petrol is coming down by four pence a gallon.
sentences.cn: 汽油的价格每加仑降了4便士。

sentences.en: The very notion of price competition is foreign to many schools.
sentences.cn: 价格竞争这个概念对于许多学校都很陌生。

sentences.en: There are intangible benefits beyond a rise in the share price.
sentences.cn: 除股价上升之外还有无形利益。

sentences.en: They dickered over the price of apples.
sentences.cn: 他们就苹果的价格讨价还价。

sentences.en: They may pay a high price for their few years of glory.
sentences.cn: 为了短短几年的辉煌，他们也许要付出高昂的代价。

sentences.en: they wanted peace at any price.
sentences.cn: 他们为了和平不惜任何代价。

sentences.en: What price a glorious repeat of last week's triumph?
sentences.cn: 还有可能再次上演上周的辉煌胜利吗？

sentences.en: what price cricket at the Olympics?.
sentences.cn: 板球进奥运会的胜算如何？。

sentences.en: what price justice if he were allowed to go free?.
sentences.cn: 如果让他逍遥法外，那么公正又将置于何地？。

sentences.en: you can't put a price on what she has to offer.
sentences.cn: 你无法对她所给予的定价。

sentences.en: You get an interesting meal for a reasonable price.
sentences.cn: 你花不多的钱就可以吃一顿很特别的饭。

words.tran_cn: 无价的；极贵重的；非常有趣的

phrases.tran_cn: 不惜任何代价；无论如何
adj. 以……的价格；以……的代价
极其珍贵的，无价的，千金难买的
竞争价格；公开招标价格
在价格上；在价格方面；就价格而言

phrases.phrase: price oneself out of the market

phrases.tran_cn: 漫天要价：对商品或服务漫天要价致使无人再购买或使用
股票价格；股票行市；交易所卖价

trans.tran_en: the amount of money you have to pay for something
the amount of money you have to pay for something

trans.tran_cn: 把…定价为，贴标价，比较价格
trans.tran_en: to decide the price of something that is for sale
